title: DARIUSBURST Chronicle Saviours

notes: Crashed the very first time I ran it, right after the display config window.  After that it was fine.  I played several times since then and it hasn't crashed at all.  Performance is perfect.

title: DARIUSBURST Chronicle Saviours

notes: Game itself runs perfectly, however dual-screen is not properly supported. If dual screen mode is selected, image will only display on one monitor and will be squished. As yet there is no known fix I have been able to find.
title: DARIUSBURST Chronicle Saviours
